title: Adding Laughs to Your Silent Night
sub_head: Holiday episodes of ‘Young Rock,’ ‘Kenan’ and ‘Mr. Mayor’ offer the gift of comedy to Christmastime programming.
body:
The meaning of Christmas? For TV viewers, it means holiday specials about the meaning of Christmas. For sitcom writers, it means wrapping their existing show inside a storyline where 1) nobody appreciates the meaning of Christmas; 2) everyone learns the meaning of Christmas; 3) everyone leaves merry and bright.
You can, over a sufficient number of yuletides, develop a seasonal allergy to such confections, and it was with some trepidation and no medication that this critic approached Wednesday evening’s NBC lineup, a triple dip into alleged merriment. It turned out to be not just funny but interesting in an academic sense: How do you inject ostensibly adult comedy with sufficient sugar to make it scream “Noel!”?
